attributes.action: Resign his position and call a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Prime Minister was not elected, he took over from a PM who had promised to serve a full term. This Prime Minister has led our economy into a huge downturn, robbed the pensions of working people to far greater effect than Robert Maxwell. This Prime Minister appears to have lost the trust of his party and cabinet. If he wins an election then he will have been given the confidence of the electorate and can then get on with the business of government and not fighting a rearguard action against his own people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
